newsitem.title: USA: Marvel, Toy Biz file reorganization plan.
newsitem.headline: Marvel, Toy Biz file reorganization plan.

text.p: Marvel Entertainment Group Inc said Wednesday it and Toy Biz Inc filed a joint plan of reorganization for Marvel in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court of Delaware.
A company statement said the plan was as described in the letter of intent signed by the companies and announced last week.
Marvel also said it retained, subject to court approval, The Blackstone Group as its investment banker.
Blackstone will help Marvel in conducting the auction process contemplated by the joint plan of reorganization.
The plan Marvel proposed last week seeks to spin off the company's comic book publishing operations and combine them with Toy Biz.
